description:
Live-action superheroes...How insipid.
Wow...
I...I never knew there was such an awesome show on TV!
Hoo...
I wanna tell them how awesome the Gachi Rangers were.
I want them to understand.
But...wait, other people in the class like Gachi Rangers too?
U-U...Umm...I, umm...I saw...I saw it too...
No...no, wait! Not a ghost or a ghoul or a poltergeist!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Can`t Help Being in Love!?
ガチで愛してしょうがない!?
